---
title: "Shrimp Taco <br> 虾肉塔可"
categories: [Seafood, Spicy]

---

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|-------------|------|--------|------|
| Large shrimp (raw, peeled, deveined) | 大虾（去壳去肠线） | 5–8 pieces | 5–8只 |
| Vegetable oil | 植物油 | 20 mL | 20毫升 |
| Bacon (cooked and crumbled) | 培根（煎熟切碎） | 1 slice | 1片 |
| Freshly ground black pepper | 现磨黑胡椒 | To lightly coat shrimp | 适量，轻撒 |
| Minced garlic | 蒜末 | 4 cloves | 4瓣 |
| Chili & lime powder | 辣椒青柠粉 | To lightly coat shrimp | 适量，轻撒 |
| Salt | 盐 | Pinch | 一撮 |
| White onion (diced) | 白洋葱（切丁） | 1 small (to taste) | 1个小洋葱（依个人口味） |
| Fresh cilantro (finely chopped) | 香菜（切碎） | To taste | 依个人口味 |
| Shredded Mexican blend cheese | 墨西哥混合芝士碎 | As needed (for tortillas) | 适量（根据饼大小） |
| Tortillas | 玉米饼/面饼 | 3 pieces | 3张 |
| Avocado (sliced) | 牛油果（切片） | 1 | 1个 |
| Preferred sauce (Chipotle, Peri-Peri, Tartar, etc.) | 喜好酱料（如烟熏辣椒酱、非洲辣酱、塔塔酱等） | To taste | 依个人口味 |



### 🍴️ Steps | 步骤

1. Prep the shrimp: Peel, devein, remove the tails, rinse, drain, and pat dry with paper towels.  
   准备虾仁：剥壳去虾线，去掉尾部，清洗后沥干，用厨房纸吸干水分。

2. Mix marinade: In a large bowl, combine shrimp, vegetable oil, black pepper, chili & lime powder, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt.  
   调制腌料：在大碗中放入虾仁、植物油、黑胡椒、辣椒青柠粉、蒜末和一撮盐，搅拌均匀。

3. Marinate for at least 30 minutes.  
   腌制：静置腌制至少30分钟，让味道充分渗入。

4. Prepare toppings: While marinating, dice the onion, chop the cilantro, and slice the avocado.  
   准备配料：腌制期间，将洋葱切丁，香菜切碎，牛油果切片。

5. Preheat skillet: Heat a large nonstick pan over medium heat.  
   加热锅具：中火预热不粘锅。

6. Form cheese base: Sprinkle shredded cheese in a circle slightly smaller than a tortilla directly onto the hot skillet.  
   制作芝士底：在热锅上撒入一圈比玉米饼略小的芝士碎。

7. Toast tortilla: Press a tortilla onto the melting cheese and cook for about 1 minute until lightly crisp. Flip and cook the other side, then transfer to a plate.  
   烘烤玉米饼：将玉米饼压在融化的芝士上，煎约1分钟至微脆，翻面再煎片刻后取出备用。

8. Cook bacon: In the same pan, cook the bacon until crisp, then crumble and set aside in a small bowl.  
   煎培根：利用同一平底锅煎培根至酥脆，取出切碎备用。

9. Cook shrimp: Use the leftover bacon oil to stir-fry the marinated shrimp until fully cooked and slightly browned.  
   炒虾仁：用剩下的培根油炒虾仁，至熟透且表面微焦。

10. Assemble the tacos: On each tortilla, layer shrimp, bacon, avocado slices, diced onion, cilantro, and your preferred sauce (Chipotle, Peri-Peri, Tartar, etc.). Serve warm.  
    组装塔可：在每张玉米饼上依次放入虾仁、培根、牛油果片、洋葱丁、香菜及喜好酱料（如烟熏辣椒酱、非洲辣酱或塔塔酱），趁热享用。
